English: Guo, a kinship group whose members held dukedoms within the Zhou Dynasty realm, including Western Guo `西~`虢~`國~|`西~`虢~国 and Eastern Guo `東~`虢~`國~|东`虢~国
francais: ancien État féodal du Shenxi et du Hunan
